description: The Channel Islands Co-Operative is building up "safety stock" should there be supply disruption.
title: Brexit: Channel Islands supermarket 'preparing' for disruption
title_page: Brexit: Channel Islands supermarket 'preparing' for disruption - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman said: "Considerable planning has already been undertaken and all elements of the supply chain are as ready as they can be without knowing the specific details of any potential deal or no deal."
